name: Shuǐ and the 12 Moons
description:
Shuǐ's little brother Dōngjì has fallen ill! Help her collect the 12 Moons of the Zodiac and summon the Moon Goddess. But be careful, a spiteful spirit lingers nearby!

-------
This Visual Novel was made for "Lunar New Year Game Jam" by (Dallas) Society of Play . This is a click puzzle game. Happy Year of the Rat! There are going to be some engine bugs in this game, sadly, I can not fix them as of now but please let me know if there are any game braking ones and I will try my best to fix those.
